RSOURCE: Source of the galaxy-size information flag
NDIST: Number of redshift-independent measurements in NED-D
D_LO68: Distance Lower bound of the 68% confidence interval
D_HI68: Distance Upper bound of the 68% confidence interval
D_LO95: Distance Lower bound of the 95% confidence interval
D_HI95: Distance Upper bound of the 95% confidence interval
Q12: Quality flag for the 12μm-band flux from IRAS
Q25: Quality flag for the 25μm-band flux from IRAS
Q60: Quality flag for the 60μm-band flux from IRAS
Q100: Quality flag for the 100μm-band flux from IRAS
WF1: 3.3μm-band (W1) apparent magnitude in the WISE forced photometry catalog
WF2: 4.6μm-band (W1) apparent magnitude in the WISE forced photometry catalog
WF3: 12μm-band (W1) apparent magnitude in the WISE forced photometry catalog
WF4: 22μm-band (W1) apparent magnitude in the WISE forced photometry catalog
E_WF1: error of 3.3μm-band (W1) apparent magnitude in the WISE forced photometry catalog
E_WF2: error of 4.6μm-band (W1) apparent magnitude in the WISE forced photometry catalog
E_WF3: error of 12μm-band (W1) apparent magnitude in the WISE forced photometry catalog
E_WF4: error of 22μm-band (W1) apparent magnitude in the WISE forced photometry catalog
WFPOINT: Is point source in the WISE forced photometry catalog.
WFTREAT: Treated as point source in the WISE forced photometry catalog.
E_J: Error of J-band apparent magnitude in 2MASS
E_H: Error of H-band apparent magnitude in 2MASS
E_K: Error of K-band apparent magnitude in 2MASS
FLAG_2MASS: Source of the 2MASS ID and magnitudes flag
E_U: Error of u-band SDSS apparent magnitude
E_G: Error of g-band SDSS apparent magnitude
E_R: Error of r-band SDSS apparent magnitude
E_I: Error of i-band SDSS apparent magnitude
E_Z: Error of z-band SDSS apparent magnitude
logL_TIR: Decimal logarithm of the total-infrared (TIR) luminosity
logL_FIR: Decimal logarithm of the far-infrared (FIR) luminosity in solar luminosities.
logL_60u: Decimal logarithm of the 60um-band luminosity in solar luminosities.
logL_12u: Decimal logarithm of the 12um-band luminosity in solar luminosities.
logL_22u: Decimal logarithm of the 22um-band luminosity in solar luminosities.
logL_K: Decimal logarithm of the K-band luminosity in solar luminosities.
ML_RATIO: Mass-to-light ratio for the 2MASS K-band using SDSS g-r colour (Bell et al. 2003).
logSFR_TIR: Decimal logarithm of the TIR-based star-formation rate in solar masses per year.
logSFR_FIR: Decimal logarithm of the FIR-based star-formation rate in solar masses per year.
logSFR_60u: Decimal logarithm of the 60um-based star-formation rate in solar masses per year.
logSFR_12u: Decimal logarithm of the 12um-based star-formation rate in solar masses per year.
logSFR_22u: Decimal logarithm of the 22um-based star-formation rate in solar masses per year.
logSFR_HEC: Decimal logarithm of the homogenised star-formation rate in solar masses per year.
FLAG_SFR_HEC: Flag indicating the source of the photometry and the SFR indicator used in the homogenised SFR: RT=IRAS-RBGS photometry and TIR indicator
logM_HEC: Decimal logarithm of the total stellar mass in solar masses.
logSFR_GSW: Decimal logarithm of the SED-based star-formation rate from the GSWLC-2 in solar masses per year.
logM_GSW: Decimal logarithm of the SED-based stellar mass from the GSWLC-2 in solar masses.
MIN_SNR: Minimum signal-to-noise ratio of the emission lines used for the activity classification (class_sp).
AGN_HEC: Adopted activity classification based on the combination of class_sp and agn_s17

F_ASTROM: Error for RA and error for DEC : +-2.78e^(-4 + flag_value)
RSOURCE: H=HyperLEDA, S=SDSS, 2=2MASS, 6=2dFGS, W=WINGS, Y=SkyMapper, A=Amiga-CIG, K=UNGC, V=VIII/77, 1=KKH2001, 7=KKH2007, N=NED.
RFLAG: Galaxy-size information flag: 0=missing, 1=all axes and positional angle defined, 2=r2 and/or pa were missing and they were set equal to r1 and 0 (circular isophote)
EDIST: 0 - measurement contains uncertainties. 1 - measurement does not contain uncertainties.
DMETHOD: N=using NED-D distance measurements, Z=regression, Zv=regression for Virgo Cluster members, C=distance from NED-D measurements but uncertainty from regression, Cv=distance from NED-D measurements but uncertainty from Virgo Cluster regressor.
WFPOINT: True if point source in the WISE forced photometry catalog.
WFTREAT: True if treated as point source in the WISE forced photometry catalog.

FLAG_METAL: -1=missing, 0=reliable, 1=O3N2 ratio >2 (outside the PP04 range), 2=low signal-to-noise ratio (<3 for the weakest line).
